name: Thoughts, Feelings, and the End of the Universe
name_original: Thoughts, Feelings, and the End of the Universe
description:
Thoughts, Feelings, and the End of the Universe is a moody game relating human experiences to stellar phenomena. 

This was the first game I made & finished! It was a solo student project.
It can be played in 2 minutes; I wrote 12 pages of reflection on it.
Feel free to contact me if you're interested, ahah.

Navigate with the glowing stars; the 3rd star has two results.
Quiet audio, starts silent. 

Thanks for stopping by!
